name: Rocket Run (Anna Tindal)
description:
Rocket Run was my final project done for my Comparative Engines class for my MFA Game Design degree at LCAD. This project was more of a Unity learning exercise and to show learning improvement from my midterm. This game includes simple AI, into menu with adjustment, sounds and an end screen.

Controls:

Keyboard & Mouse

Gas, Forward
WStop Gas, Slow down
SSteer left/right
A,DDirection movement
Mouse

Assets:

Rocket

Spacer Shoot Sound Bundle SFX

Low Poly Sci Fi Planets
